block.p: Susan Jane Brady, a daughter of Jane and Gerald Brady of Bloomfield, Conn., was married yesterday to Gregory Lynn Miles, the son of Virginia Miles and Dr. Leland Miles of Fairfield, Conn. The Rev. Aldo J. Tos performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Church in New York.

The bride, who is keeping her name, is the director for foundation relations at the New York Public Library. She graduated magna cum laude from Tufts University. Her father is the senior partner in Brady, Willard & Alexander, a law firm in East Hartford, Conn. Her mother is an adjunct professor of English at Capital Community College in Hartford.

Her father is the senior partner in Brady, Willard & Alexander, a law firm in East Hartford, Conn. Her mother is an adjunct professor of English at Capital Community College in Hartford.

The bridegroom is a reporter in Fort Lee, N.J., for CNBC, the business news cable channel. He graduated from Wesleyan University and received master's degrees in journalism and in international affairs from Columbia. His father was the president of the University of Bridgeport from 1974 to 1987 and the president of the International Association of University Presidents. The bridegroom's mother, who was the liaison officer for international students at Bridgeport, is on the board of the Greater Bridgeport Symphony.
